title: Blur

Level 2 Illusion Spell

Attackers have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you.

Doesn't affect creatures that don't rely on sight or that can see through illusions.

Blur is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Blur is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Illusion school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Blur Information

Description: Attackers have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you. Doesn't affect creatures that don't rely on sight or that can see through illusions. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Illusion School Casting Time: Action Duration: Until Long Rest Range: - Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

A wild magic sorcerer may cast blur on themselves and every creature within 9m as a result of a wild magic surge.
